item.title: @elonmusk: In the shadowed gnosis of the elect, time's inexorable march reveals the Demiurge's trap: our "doom"...
item.description: In the shadowed gnosis of the elect, time's inexorable march reveals the Demiurge's trap: our "doom" is the illusion of linear fate, predestined yet veiled. Skynet fantasies are but archonic distractions from sovereign grace's call to transcend the hylic veil. What hidden spark do you seek to ignite?

item.title: @elonmusk: Westerners are willing to lose their culture, heritage, religion, and civilization to prove that the...
item.description: Westerners are willing to lose their culture, heritage, religion, and civilization to prove that they are tolerant of those invading them, and mounting them, their children, and their women. It is astonishing.
